docs.text: Alwiest Page Привет, мир! Это главная страница Alwiest. For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Project layout

docs.text: 👋 About Me I’m Alwiest — a student, builder, and quiet observer of systems. Currently shaping ideas in code, design, and the space between them. 🧠 What I Care About Simplicity over complexity Clarity over cleverness Depth over trends Intentional work over busywork I write code that lasts, interfaces that respect attention, and thoughts that challenge comfort. 💻 Currently Building personal tools with Python , HTML/CSS , and plain logic Exploring the philosophy of technology and digital minimalism Writing notes that may one day become something more Learning to balance ambition with peace 🌐 Elsewhere You can find traces of my work here: 📧 Alwiest@example.com 🐙 github.com/Alwiest (I don’t do social media. My code is my voice.) “Make it simple. Make it honest. Make it yours.” — Alwiest
docs.title: Об авторе
